com.red.boxx

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.red.boxx.Board
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MenuBoard, TwoPlayerBoard

    public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    This is where the main game logic goes At render-time, this class scans through a map and places the objects in the correct location. At render-time, this class updates where the enemies are located. This class checks the wining and losing conditions
